item.title: Tesla’s Q3 Deliveries Hit Quarterly Record, Rise 7% To Exceed Analyst Estimates
item.description: Tesla stated that it sold 481,166 Model 3 and Model Y vehicles, and only 15,933 units of its more premium offerings.

item.title: Dow Futures Edge Lower As Investors Exercise Caution Amid Government Shutdown: OXY, BRK, FRMI, TSLA Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures were down by 0.08% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures gained 0.28%.
